text:
Morning Chris. 
Not sure if you know if this - a little spendy but I know both the mill and ETC had accounts for artists to access for learnings, so it has been considered relevant and useful learning

<https://www.fxphd.com/courses/|https://www.fxphd.com/courses/>

attachments.title: our courses | learn with fxphd
attachments.text: View our lineup of over 240 visual effects, 3D, and production courses which are available with an fxphd membership. We have over 1600 hours of training to take your career to the next level.
attachments.fallback: fxphd: our courses | learn with fxphd

text: Ok awesome! Thanks I will check it out.
Oh also -- cinefx if you have a apple product, cinefx is online and you can view most issues - if you aren't aware of it it's a written breakdown in detail of how shots and sequences were achieved

Oh awesome!
And if I have apple product its free?
